mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, Yellow Room
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Schneckenburger, Martin G., 1884-1950
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of the yellow room at Mount Vernon. The view is of the east wall and includes the bedstead, window and furnishings. The photograph has been mounted onto a larger board and the number '66' has been written belown the bottom right corner of the photograph.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion interior
p yellow room
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: MVLA Archives ; Restoration Files for the Historic Structure Report--Series 1, Buildings
